articles.title: Greetings to President of Zimbabwe
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Zimbabwe
Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on April 12 sent a message to Robert G. Mugabe, president of Zimbabwe, congratulating him on the 33rd anniversary of the republic.
					The message expressed belief that the traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger, wishing the president and people of Zimbabwe successes in their efforts to protect the country's sovereignty and achieve national unity and socio-economic progress.

articles.title: Friendly Joint Meeting with Delegation, Delegates of Juche Idea Study Organizations Held
articles.content:
Friendly Joint Meeting with Delegation, Delegates of Juche Idea Study Organizations Held
Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- A friendly joint meeting with delegation and delegates of Juche idea study organizations was held on Wednesday.
					Present at the meeting were Director-General of the International Institute of the Juche Idea Vishwanath who is also secretary general of the International Kim Il Sung Prize Council and the International Kim Jong Il Prize Council, delegations and delegates of Juche idea study organizations now on a visit to the DPRK to celebrate the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					Members of the Social Scientists Society of Korea including Vice-Chairman Ri Kil Song were present there.
					
					The participants watched a video dealing with the situation of the DPRK where the building of a thriving socialist nation is making successful progress under the banner of the great Juche idea.
					
					They talked to one another about achievements made in studying and disseminating the Juche idea, proud of being followers of the Juche idea founded by Kim Il Sung and developed by leader Kim Jong Il. They sang songs together, deepening friendship.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Chairman of Kimjongilia Association of Mongolia
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Chairman of Kimjongilia Association of Mongolia
Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a gift from S. Sod Baatar, chairman of the Kimjongilia Association of Mongolia.
					The gift was handed over to an official concerned on Monday by the chairman who is heading a delegation of the association participating in the 15th Kimilsungia Festival.

articles.title: Delegations, Delegates of Juche Idea Study Organizations Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Delegations, Delegates of Juche Idea Study Organizations Visit Mangyongdae
Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- The visiting delegations and delegates of Juche idea study organizations went to Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung, on the occasion of his birth anniversary.
					They went round historic relics, recollecting with deep emotion the revolutionary life and feats of the President.
					
					Anatoli Dolgachev, head of a delegation of the Association for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism in the Far East, Russia, said Kim Il Sung was the great leader not only of the Korean people but of progressive mankind.
					
					He devoted his all to the people, the head noted, adding his feats will be everlasting.
					
					The chairman of the National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea in Democratic Congo said the Juche idea founded by the President is promoting the cause of global independence.
					
					Meanwhile, the guests visited the venue of the 15th Kimilsungia Festival, Museum of Weapons and Equipment of the Korean People's Army, National Gifts Exhibition House, etc.

articles.title: Chairman of Korean Friendship Association Visits Pyongyang Mission of AINDF
articles.content:
Chairman of Korean Friendship Association Visits Pyongyang Mission of AINDF
Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Visiting Alejandro Cao de Benos, chairman of the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain, and his party visited the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front (AINDF) on Wednesday.
					Chief Jo Il Min and staff members of the mission greeted the guests and had a talk with them.
					
					The chief told them that ardent reverence was expressed by south Korean people for President Kim Il Sung and his personality as a great man is being widely introduced on the occasion of his birth anniversary.
					
					Voices expressing deep respect for the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un are heard from different parts of south Korea, he noted.
					
					He briefed them on the dynamic actions staged by south Korean people against the U.S. imperialists and south Korean warmongers' daily escalating confrontation with the north.
					
					The chairman released a statement on the tough-and-go situation prevailing on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					The statement branded the U.S. and south Korean puppets' nuclear war maneuvers against the DPRK as a blatant challenge to the self-defensive steps taken by the DPRK to defend the sovereignty and dignity of the country.
					
					No force on earth can break the indomitable revolutionary spirit and strong will of the Korean people rallied close around Marshal Kim Jong Un, the statement noted.
					
					It said the association would positively support the just struggle of the Korean people against the anti-DPRK moves of the U.S. and south Korean puppet regime.

articles.title: Participants in Art Festival Tour Pyongyang
articles.content:
Participants in Art Festival Tour Pyongyang
Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- The participants in the Third April Spring People's Art Festival visited the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong.
					They laid bouquets before the bust of Kim Jong Suk, woman commander of Mt. Paektu, and made bows.
					
					Visiting the National Gifts Exhibition House, they made bows before a full-length painting of the smiling great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in the general review room. They went round gifts prepared with deep reverence of all fellow countrymen for the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu.
					
					They also toured the Pyongyang Folklore Park, the Rungna People's Pleasure Park the Rungna Dolphinarium.

articles.title: Participants in Art Festival Conduct Agitation for Increased Production
articles.content:
Participants in Art Festival Conduct Agitation for Increased Production
Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- The participants in the Third April Spring People's Art Festival Wednesday performed at the construction site of the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Memorial Tower and light industrial factories in Pyongyang.
					Members of the art squads of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League and South Hamgyong, South Phyongan, Jagang, South Hwanghae, North Phyongan and Kangwon provinces went to the construction site of the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum and staged performances, encouraging soldier-builders.
					
					Oungum ensemble "Long Journey to Front Made by General Kim Jong Il", chorus "Our Leader Loved by People" and other numbers mesmerized the audience.
					
					Members of the itinerant art squads of the Pyongyang Kim Jong Suk Silk Mill and the Kim Jong Thae Electric Locomotive Complex went to the Pyongyang Kim Jong Suk Textile Mill and the Pyongyang Cornstarch Factory and staged guitar ensemble "The Masters of This Land Tell", harmonica and drumbeating ensemble "Let's Push Back Frontiers of Latest Science and Technology" and other numbers.

articles.title: Foreigners, Overseas Koreans Leave
articles.content:
Foreigners, Overseas Koreans Leave
Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Kenichi Ogami, secretary general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, and his party left here by air on Wednesday.
					Also leaving here were delegations of overseas Koreans after taking part in the 15th Kimilsungia Festival.

articles.title: DPRK Team Beats Its Mongolian Rival 8:0
articles.content:
DPRK Team Beats Its Mongolian Rival 8:0
Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- The DPRK football team scored eight goals against its Mongolian rival on Tuesday in preliminary match of Group H for the 2014 U-14 AFC Soccer Championship in Hong Kong, China.
					The DPRK team will play its last match with its Macao rival on April 17.

articles.title: Bio-fuel Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
Bio-fuel Developed in DPRK
Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- The 413 Institute under the State Academy of Sciences in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea has developed a new kind of bio-fuel, with rice chaff, sawdust, wood shavings, dried leaves and straw as raw materials.
					Ko Il Yong, deputy director of the institute, told KCNA:
					
					On the basis of analysis of rational indexes of crushed bio-materials, the institute has set up the production processes for the fuel.
					
					It also made stoves for the fuel.
					
					The fuel's heat value is more than 4,000kcal/kg.
					
					500kg of the fuel are tantamount to 1 tonne of coal.
					
					The fuel is increasingly gaining popularity among users.
					
					As substitute for electricity and coal, it gives no adverse effect on ecological environment.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Urges U.S. to Properly Understand Root Cause of Grave Situation in Korea
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Urges U.S. to Properly Understand Root Cause of Grave Situation in Korea
Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is becoming craftier in its moves to stifle the DPRK.
					Having rapidly deployed huge armed forces for aggression on the Korean Peninsula and in its vicinity and rounded off the preparations for attack through Foal Eagle joint military exercises, the U.S. is now pretending to be interested in detente in a bid to mislead the public opinion.
					
					Its high-ranking officials vied with each other to assert that "the U.S. keeps the door of dialogue with north Korea open," while disclosing before media that "planned military actions have been shelved" and "military-related  meetings put off." 
					
					This is another poor charade to conceal its criminal nature as the arch criminal who created a touch-and-go situation on the peninsula. It is a product of base intrigues to shift the blame for tension on to the DPRK and invent a pretext for igniting a war.
					
					What matters is that those following the U.S. are dancing to the tune of its farce.
					
					As shown by history, truth cannot be voted down by a hand-raising machine.
					
					If one truly wants to defuse the tension on the peninsula, one should properly understand its root cause.
					
					The worst situation on the peninsula is entirely attributable to the U.S. vicious policy and hostile acts against the DPRK. It is pursuant to the U.S. sinister scenario to stifle the DPRK at the early stage of its historical turn. 
					
					To this end the U.S. stirred up an atmosphere of confrontation, terming the DPRK's legitimate satellite launch for peaceful purposes "a ballistic missile launch". 
					
					It kicked up much fuss over "provocation" though the DPRK's successful satellite launch was scientifically confirmed by the U.S. Space Command and academic circles.
					
					When the DPRK conducted a nuclear test for self-defence to cope with the U.S. brigandish actions, it prodded the UN Security Council into cooking up "resolutions on sanctions" by using its hand-raising machine inside it. It staged Key Resolve and Foal Eagle war maneuvers, pushing the situation to the brink of war.
					
					Much upset by the DPRK's declaration of an all-out action to put an end to the showdown with the U.S., nullification of the Armistice Agreement and a series of other toughest measures taken by it, the U.S. began to hatch new plots. This is evidenced by the "demonstration of armed forces against north" under the motto of provision of "nuclear umbrella" and diplomacy for international "pressure" under the pretext of so-called implementation of the UN "resolutions on sanctions".
					
					In pursuance of its scenario, the U.S. is egging the Japanese reactionaries and south Korean puppet forces on to commit all provocations and smear campaigns extremely rattling the nerves of the DPRK.
					
					Unlike frantic provocations of south Korean stooges the U.S. is busy orchestrating a charade to create an "atmosphere of dialogue" and meetings for "close touch and joint reaction" with neighboring counties in a bid to convince the international community of "belligerency" of the DPRK.
					
					The U.S. is, however, seriously mistaken. With no rhetoric can it evade the blame for the grave situation on the peninsula.
					
					This only goes to prove that the U.S. remains unchanged in its policy for stifling the DPRK and its scenario for a new war is being pushed forward at its final phase.
					
					This is clear from the fact that the U.S. is playing a petty trick to slacken the alertness of the DPRK while talking about "peaceful atmosphere in Pyongyang", and taking much pain to spy on the intention of the DPRK while vociferating about someone's "propaganda warfare" and "psychological warfare". This will, however, no longer work on the DPRK.
					
					As long as the U.S. hostile policy persists, peace and stability will not settle on the peninsula but will be put at greater peril and this will compel the DPRK to take tougher countermeasures.
					
					The only way of settling the situation there is for the U.S. to roll back its hostile policy.
					
					The U.S. would be well advised to bear in mind that it can never evade the blame for the grave situation prevailing on the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Defending Dignity of Supreme Leadership
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Defending Dignity of Supreme Leadership
Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Now the Korean people and the world progressive mankind are significantly celebrating the 101st birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung as the greatest national holiday and auspicious event common to the nation.
					However, only the south Korean puppet forces perpetrated such hideous atrocities as instigating a group of anti-communist gangsters to hold an anti-DPRK meeting in the center of Seoul in broad daylight and hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					
					The Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army issued an ultimatum to the south Korean puppet group as regards the prevailing acute situation, warning that it will wipe out to the last man those who hurt the dignity of the DPRK's supreme leadership.
					
					Rodong Sinmun Wednesday editorially calls on all service personnel and people to turn out as one in the sacred war for protecting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the country as was stated in the ultimatum.
					
					Hurting and slandering the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK amounts to negating the Korean nation, and an outrageous treason of mangling the hearts of its service persons and people, the editorial says, and goes on:
					
					The south Korean puppet forces' another atrocity beyond imagination was prompted by their dangerous scenario to weaken the reverence of all Koreans for the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu and break the mainstay of the army and people in the DPRK.
					
					It is the firm will of the army and people of the DPRK to make thousand-fold retaliation against the enemies at any cost wherever they might be.
					
					The world will clearly see how all service personnel and people of the DPRK uphold and protect the dignity of its supreme leadership in the present all-out confrontation with the U.S.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Condemns S. Korean Puppet Group for Hurting Dignity of DPRK Supreme Leadership
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Condemns S. Korean Puppet Group for Hurting Dignity of DPRK Supreme Leadership
Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet group committed a thrice-cursed hideous crime of holding an anti-DPRK rally in downtown Seoul and dare torching portraits of great men symbolic of the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK, not content with viciously slandering the celebrations held in the DPRK to mark the Day of the Sun.
					Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					It is none other than the south Korean puppet group of hooligans who are bereft of the elementary etiquette and morality, to say nothing of the nation's pride and self-esteem.
					
					The puppet group let loose a spate of vituperation against the celebrations of the Day of the Sun and mobilized gangsters to hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK in the center of Seoul. This is an open declaration of a war against the DPRK.
					
					Their recent act has almost triggered off a nuclear war.
					
					No one can turn back to the present situation on the Korean Peninsula that has already crossed the threshold of a war. 
					
					To be included in the targets of retaliation are Seoul, the hotbed of politically-motivated provocation, those directly or indirectly involved in the operation of hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and the puppet authorities and their bosses who instigated the perpetrators and connived at their crime. They are already destined to meet punishment.
					
					We can never live with the puppet group under the same sky. 
					
					The army and the people of the DPRK will wipe out the group of traitors who committed the thrice-cursed unpardonable crime and give vent to their pent-up grudge through powerful retaliation action without notice and immediate start of just military operation.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Accuses U.S. of Shipping Nuclear War Hardware into S. Korea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Accuses U.S. of Shipping Nuclear War Hardware into S. Korea
Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- The U.S. recently deployed two super-large nuclear-powered carriers to the waters near the Korean Peninsula in secrecy. Timed to coincide with this, it rapidly dispatched there a nuclear submarine and more than 2 000 seamen of the U.S. Marines.
					The U.S. is getting frantic in its war maneuvers to invade the north by introducing the largest-ever nuclear war hardware into south Korea and its vicinity. The ulterior aim sought by it is to provoke a nuclear war against the DPRK.
					
					Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					The U.S. and its satellite forces have become all the more provocative in their acts, while branding the measures taken by the DPRK for its self-defence as an "pressure" and "provocation".
					
					The present grave situation prevailing on the Korean Peninsula is entirely ascribable to the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK. It is as clear as noonday that the U.S. and its allies are entirely to blame for this.
					
					A nuclear war may break out any moment on the peninsula due to the reckless saber-rattling of the U.S., bringing the dark clouds of a nuclear war.
					
					The DPRK is by no means afraid of a war though it does not want it.
					
					The U.S. is trying to provoke the DPRK by introducing its huge nuclear force. But it is a foolish pipedream.
					
					The DPRK is fully ready to honorably conclude the long-standing showdown with the U.S. by meeting the latter's military challenges.
					
					As the DPRK repeatedly stated to the world, it makes no empty words.
					
					The U.S. had better behave itself, bearing this in mind.

articles.title: U.S. Had Better Fulfill Its Commitments: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. Had Better Fulfill Its Commitments: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and its followers are talking such rubbish as "violation of international obligation" and "provocative steps" over the measures taken by the DPRK to develop  nuclear power industry and bolster nuclear deterrence.
					Rodong Sinmun Wednesday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard: This indicates they are working hard to incriminate again the DPRK's activities to implement its new line of simultaneously pushing forward the economic construction and the building of nuclear force.
					
					The "violation of international obligation" means that the DPRK's step is a breach of the September 19 joint statement adopted at the six-party talks, the commentary notes, urging the U.S. to properly fulfill its commitments.
					
					The joint statement was adopted by the countries which were allegedly interested in the issue of the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula in 2005, the principle of which is "word for word" and "action for action."
					
					However, the U.S. did nothing to implement the joint statement but was keen on acts quite contrary to it, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					The U.S. took the lead in wantonly violating the sovereignty of the DPRK, much less abiding by the purpose and principles of the UN Charter.
					
					While keeping no promise, the U.S. termed the DPRK's satellite liftoff a "long-range missile launch" and staged DPRK-targeted large-scale joint nuclear military exercises every year. Now it has the effrontery to accuse the DPRK of violating an international obligation and derailing the six-party talks.
					
					The U.S. has adopted various important documents with the DPRK in the past but none of them has been implemented. The latter suffered losses amounting to astronomical figures.
					
					The steps taken by the DPRK recently represented a just option based on the conclusion that there is no need to argue pro and con with the U.S. any longer and it is necessary to protect the sovereignty of the country and build an economic power by its own efforts.
					
					The U.S. had better remain true to its international commitments before anyone else, bearing in mind that its reckless behavior in the relations with other countries in violation of international obligation would bring it more serious setbacks.

articles.title: Traitors Can Never Be Pardoned: Advisor
articles.content:
Traitors Can Never Be Pardoned: Advisor
Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Ri Ki Sok, advisor to the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), was interviewed by KCNA on Tuesday. He is heading the delegation of Koreans in Japan for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					He said he came to the socialist homeland, reflecting the unanimous desire of Chongryon officials and Koreans in Japan to significantly celebrate the birth anniversary of Generalissimo Kim Il Sung, adding:
					
					Kim Il Sung was a peerless patriot and legendary hero.
					
					The grand celebrations of the Day of the Sun clearly showed the profound reverence of all people for him who made a history of the great sun. I was terribly shocked by the news that there took place a thrice-cursed crime in the south which seriously spoiled this festive atmosphere.
					
					Reading the ultimatum sent by the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army to the south Korean puppet group, I could not repress my surging resentment at it. Anti-communist gangsters held an anti-DPRK meeting in Seoul in broad daylight at a time when the whole world was celebrating the Day of the Sun. At this meeting they committed the thrice-cursed act of seriously hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					
					Angered by this news, the members of our delegation are renewing their determination to take revenge upon them.
					
					Doesn't the puppet group fear punishment from Heaven for committing such treason? The group of traitors can never go scot-free. The group of traitors and gangsters should be eliminated to the last one as they ceased to be part of the nation.
					
					Now is the time to clearly show that there is no room for the human scum to stay.
					
					If the south Korean authorities truly want dialogue and negotiations, they should show all fellow countrymen their genuine will to make an apology for all the anti-DPRK hostile acts and totally stop them.
					
					Chongryon officials and Koreans in Japan will join all the service personnel and people in the homeland in the actions to give vent to their resentment and take revenge upon the traitors.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Slammed for Driving KIZ into Crisis
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Slammed for Driving KIZ into Crisis
Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- The General Bureau for Central Guidance to the Development of the Special Zone of the DPRK issued a memorandum on Tuesday to clarify how the Kaesong Industrial Zone (KIZ) was built and who drove it into a crisis.
					According to the memorandum, KIZ was built as a symbol of reconciliation, cooperation and reunification, pursuant to the bold decision made by leader Kim Jong Il out of his deep love for the nation and compatriots, valuing a south Korean businessman's patriotic will for reunification.
					
					Kim Jong Il received Jong Ju Yong, honorary chairman of the Hyundai Group of south Korea, in October 1999 and June 2000 and met his request for allowing him to build a special economic zone for cooperation between the north and the south in an area of the north, the memorandum said, and went on: As a result, 123 south Korean businesses entered KIZ for co-prosperity.
					
					The dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un paid attention to KIZ despite the acute situation where the moves of anti-reunification forces for confrontation and war reached an extreme phase. He wisely led the work to ensure that operations in KIZ are preserved and reenergized.
					
					The south Korean puppet conservative group, displeased with the building of KIZ from the outset, has run the whole gamut of moves to torpedo operations in the zone.
					
					The "Grand National Party", the predecessor of the "Saenuri Party", obstructed the operations in KIZ as soon as the ground was broken in the zone, claiming that "special economic zone would help north develop nuclear weapons and missiles" and "it might be a drain on resources".
					
					Coming to power, traitor Lee Myung Bak began to trample down the October 4 declaration, thus putting the brake in the wheel of implementing articles on the building of KIZ clarified in the declaration.
					
					Kim Ha Jung, the then minister of Unification, in March 2008 at round-table talks with enterprise representatives in KIZ and on other occasions undisguisedly disclosed his black-hearted intention to derail the operations in KIZ.
					
					Such moves of the Lee group got pronounced with the Cheonan warship sinking case in March 2010 as an occasion. The deliberate moves of the group to scuttle the operations in KIZ brought the plan to develop more than 60 million square meters in the zone in three phases to a standstill. Less than half of the planned project for first-phase area finished and came to a hiatus, to say nothing of the second and third-phase development.
					
					The Lee group, not content with this, turned KIZ into a theatre of smear campaign and confrontation with the north.
					
					The operations in KIZ have been put in a more serious crisis by the present conservative regime which has carried forward the vicious confrontation policy of the Lee regime.
					
					Right after the appearance of the present regime, it totally blocked even the cooperation between north and south non-governmental organizations which had barely been kept afloat, desperately enforcing "sanctions" against the DPRK over its satellite launch for peaceful purposes and nuclear test for self-defence. From February last it strictly controlled the entry of goods into KIZ. It worked hard to turn KIZ into a theatre of confrontation with the north. It seriously hurt the dignity of the DPRK, describing KIZ "a source of money" and "source of food" of the north
					
					Right after Kim Kwan Jin was allowed to stay in the office as puppet minister of Defence, he desperately worked to reduce KIZ to a hotbed of war, escalating with increased frenzy the moves for a war against the north together with the U.S.
					
					Timed to coincide with this, the military gangsters committed such hideous provocation as working out a plan for precision strikes at the monuments to the leaders, symbolic of the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK, in Pyongyang and other cities of the DPRK.
					
					Kim Pyong Gwan, designated as minister of Defense when the cabinet was in the making in south Korea, a spokesman for the Ministry of Defence and other gangsters let loose a spate of invectives daring hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK such as "fall of the north's regime", "its change" and "its collapse." 
					
					Even the chief of Chongwadae cried out for "change", openly slandering the DPRK over its social system, economy and people's living. She went the lengths of seriously insulting the DPRK, jabbering that the "north would get nothing through nuclear development and provocation" and "the north can expect nothing unless it dismantles its nuclear weapons".
					
					Needless to say, KIZ can hardly exist amid such unprecedented mayhem of confrontation.
					
					The conservative group is now becoming vociferous about "normalization of operations in KIZ" and "dialogue". It is doing so not because of any concern for the minor south Korean enterprises or any wish to bring about a turn in the phase. But it is nothing but a crafty ploy to evade the blame for the crisis in KIZ and justify the moves for confrontation and war.
					
					The puppet group can never evade its responsibility for the present grave situation in KIZ. If the group keeps vilifying the important step taken by the DPRK in a bid to pass the buck for the crisis to it, the situation will reach a more uncontrollable phase.

articles.title: Day of Sun Celebrated in Russia
articles.content:
Day of Sun Celebrated in Russia
Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- A Korean book, photo and fine art exhibition was opened in Moscow on April 11 to celebrate the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					Displayed at the venue of the exhibition were photos of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					Also on display there were works of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu and photos and fine art works showing the proud achievements made by the Korean people in building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					Present at the opening ceremony were officials of the Party for Peace and Unity of Russia, the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, the Liberal Democratic Party, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, the newspaper Patriotic Office, the International Scientific and Technological Information Center and other units, masses and the charge d'affaires ad interim and staff members of the DPRK embassy in Moscow.
					
					The participants laid a floral basket and bouquets before portraits of the Generalissimos.
					
					Speeches were made at the ceremony.
					
					Sazhi Umalatova, chairperson of the Party for Peace and Unity of Russia, warmly congratulated the Korean people on the 101st birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung. She added:
					
					The DPRK is a great country which demonstrated its might as a powerful country dignified in independence. It has met all challenges of the imperialists as it has been led by the distinguished leaders.
					
					Kim Jong Un is a peerless patriot who is devoting his all to the people with ardent patriotism and a great leader with conviction of victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche, absolute trust in the army and the people and dynamic practices.
					
					The DPRK is sure to win victory after victory as it is led by Kim Jong Un, the most outstanding leader in the present times.
					
					The editor-in-chief of Patriot said that the Korean people will win a final victory as they are led by Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Day of Sun Marked in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Day of Sun Marked in Foreign Countries
Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Various events took place in foreign countries to mark the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					They included a lecture in Romania, friendly meeting and reception in Russia, round-table talks and film show in Indonesia and meeting, film show and photo exhibition in Bangladesh from Mar. 29 to Apr. 2.
					
					Displayed in the venues of those events were photos showing the President's immortal feats.
					
					The participants in the film shows watched "Fireworks for a Thriving Nation" and other Korean films.
					
					Vasile Orleanu, chairman of the Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania, said: The DPRK is fully demonstrating its dignity as a Juche-oriented socialist power entirely because the President dedicated himself to the prosperity of the country and nation all his life.
					
					Harinder Singh, secretary general of the National Leading Council of the Diversity Party of Indonesia, expressed belief that the army and people of the DPRK united close around the dear respected Kim Jong Un, the successor to the cause of Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, will surely emerge victorious in the confrontation with the U.S.
					
					Garib Newaz, president of the Bangladesh People's League, and other speakers praised the President for having founded the immortal Juche idea and indicated the road to be followed not only by the Korean people but by progressive mankind.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised by Foreign Papers
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised by Foreign Papers
Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Foreign newspapers devoted special write-ups illustrated with a portrait of smiling President Kim Il Sung to his birth anniversary (the Day of the Sun).
					The Mar. 31-Apr. 14 issue of the Bulgarian paper Zaraba dedicated a whole page to an article titled "A great master of the 20th century" and other articles under the headline "101st birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung".
					
					The article titled "Life guided by the maxim of believing in people as in Heaven" said:
					
					Kim Il Sung believed in the people as in Heaven and always found himself among them, reflecting their wishes and aspirations in policies.
					
					His life was characterized by ardent love and total dedication to the people.
					
					He is always alive in the hearts of progressive mankind as tender-hearted father and great leader of the people.
					
					The Malaysian Guang Ming Daily on April 5 carried an article captioned "Great H.E. Kim Il Sung, eternal leader of Korean people" illustrated with photos of his old home in Mangyongdae and Kimilsungia, flower of the sun.
					
					The article said:
					
					There were many people who left traces in the history of world politics in the 20th century, but no one enjoyed so absolute support and trust from the people as the President did for his outstanding idea, leadership and noble personality from his teenage to the advanced age of 80.
					
					The 20th century was, in fact, the President's century.
					
					He was a great statesman who carved out and glorified a new modern history under the banner of independence.
					
					He was a peerlessly great man in history.
					
					Natun Bangla of Bangladesh on April 1 and Horoya of Guinea on April 4 carried articles titled "Kim Il Sung, holding high the banner of independence" and "The Day of the Sun in the DPRK".

articles.title: Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Praised by Personages of Nepal, Indonesia
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Praised by Personages of Nepal, Indonesia
Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Seminars took place in Nepal and Indonesia on April 8 and 11 on the occasions of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung and the 20th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					The general secretary of the C.C., the Nepal Communist Party (Marxist-Leninist) and other speakers referred to the noble revolutionary career and immortal exploits of Kim Il Sung, who built a socialist power in Korea and clearly indicated the way to be followed by the progressive people for building new society.
					
					The director of a company of Indonesia said:
					
					Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il were the greatest men revered by the whole world. Kim Il Sung performed great feats in accomplishing the cause of global independence. The banner of independence held high by him serves as a driving force encouraging the Korean people and all other progressives in their struggle.
					
					The Korean people are standing firm against the U.S. moves for a war under the wise leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un. We express full support to his line on simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force.
					
					The director of the Rabitra Bahtera Pratama Co. of Indonesia expressed belief that the army and people of the DPRK would surely emerge victorious in confrontation with the U.S. as they are led by Marshal Kim Jong Un, an outstanding strategist.

articles.title: Korean Book, Photo and Fine Art Exhibition Opens in China
articles.content:
Korean Book, Photo and Fine Art Exhibition Opens in China
Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- A Korean book, photo and fine art exhibition was opened in Beijing on April 15, the 101st birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					Displayed at the venue of the exhibition were photos of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					Also on display there were works of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu, books and photos introducing Songun Korea and fine art works associated with the creative wisdom and talents of the Korean people.
					
					Present at the opening ceremony were officials of the public and cultural fields, masses, the DPRK ambassador to China and staff members of his embassy.
					
					At the ceremony the speakers said that the exhibition was opened on the Day of the Sun, the 101st birth anniversary of the President.
					
					He, the great leader of the Korean people and close friend of the Chinese people, made distinguished contributions to developing the Sino-DPRK friendly relations, they noted.
					
					They stressed that the exhibition will mark an occasion of very great significance in boosting the cultural and art exchange between the two countries.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Germany
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Germany
Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and People" was brought out in booklet by a publishing house in Germany.
					The work, made public on April 20, Juche 101 (2012), clarifies the revolutionary exploits President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il performed during their lifetimes. It also indicates tasks for firmly defending and eternally glorifying their idea and exploits.
					
					A book releasing ceremony took place in Berlin on April 11.

articles.title: DPRK Praised by Indonesian Paper
articles.content:
DPRK Praised by Indonesian Paper
Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- The Indonesian paper Siputar Indonesia on April 10 carried an article introducing the Korean people in their struggle to defend the country under the title "To defend the sovereignty".
					The paper noted:
					
					The U.S. prodded the UN Security Council into cooking up the "resolutions on sanctions" against the DPRK, terming its satellite launch for peaceful purposes a "long-range missile launch" and a "grave challenge" to world peace and security.
					
					The satellite launch for peaceful purposes is the right of all countries as it is a legitimate exercise of the sovereignty under international law on the right to use space for peaceful purposes. International law has an article encouraging satellite launches, not an article banning them.
					
					Explaining the reasons why the DPRK conducted its third underground nuclear test, the paper said:
					
					The international community regards the DPRK's third underground nuclear test as a step to defend the sovereignty and dignity of the country from the U.S. preemptive attack, threat, sanctions and pressure.
					
					As recognized by the world, the DPRK is a country strong in independence and a country which does what it is determined to do.
					
					The Korean people have launched an all-out action to defend the sovereignty of the country from the hostile acts of the U.S. and its allies.
					
					The world will clearly witness how the Korean people all out in the struggle to defend the sovereignty of the country will punish all hostile forces and emerge a final victor.

articles.title: Swiss Organizations Support WPK's New Line
articles.content:
Swiss Organizations Support WPK's New Line
Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea made public a joint statement on April 1 in support of the line on simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force set forth at the March, 2013 plenary meeting of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea.
					The statement said:
					
					Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the WPK, made a report and a concluding speech at the plenary meeting.
					
					The meeting adopted a decision on simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force as required by the developing revolution of Korea. This is a brilliant succession of the line on simultaneously building economy and national defence put forward and thoroughly applied by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and its development in depth onto a new higher stage.
					
					According to the decision of the meeting, the DPRK will legalize its possession of nukes and bolster them both in quality and quantity till the world is denuclearized.
					
					The DPRK, a responsible nuclear weapons state, will make every possible effort to prevent the nuclear proliferation, to defend peace and security in Asia and the rest of the world and realize the denuclearization of the world.
					
					It will also direct efforts into agriculture and light industry, the main targets in building an economic power, and stabilize and improve the standard of people's living at the shortest time.

articles.title: Special Statement of DPRK Supported by Beninese Organizations
articles.content:
Special Statement of DPRK Supported by Beninese Organizations
Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- The Benin-Korea Amicable Association "Long Live Kim Jong Il, Supreme Leader" and the Benin National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea expressed full support for the special statement of the government, political parties and organizations of the DPRK.
					The organizations in their joint statement on April 1 said the DPRK government, political parties and organizations in a special statement on March 30, 2013 declared that the inter-Korean relations will be put at the state of war, adding:
					
					The U.S. deployed B-52, B-2A and other latest strategic strike means in the sky above south Korea from its mainland to stage bombing drills against the DPRK. This is a clear provocation.
					
					South Korea, taking advantage of the U.S. reckless nuclear war maneuvers, revealed its attempt to dare hurt the symbol of the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK, crying out for "strike on commanding forces".
					
					React to nuclear blackmail of the U.S. imperialists with merciless nuclear attack, and the war of aggression with an all-out war of justice! This is a resolute answer of the DPRK.
					
					We express invariable solidarity for the Korean people out all in the just cause for a final victory.

articles.title: MINREX de RPDC rechaza dialogo con EE.UU.
articles.content:
MINREX de RPDC rechaza dialogo con EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 17 de abril (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hizo publica el dia 16 la siguiente declaracion:
					En estos dias, las autoridades de alto rango de Estados Unidos hablan a porfia del dialogo con la PRDC.
					
					Esto no pasa de ser una vil artimana tendente a evadir de la responsabilidad de la exacerbacion de la tension en visperas de la guerra, procediendo como si se controlara en las acciones militares y deseara el dialogo.
					
					EE.UU. es precisamente el autor principal que creo el circulo vicioso de la agravacion de tension conforme a la politica de aplastar con la fuerza la RPDC y llevo a la fase peor la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Se inicio la exacerbacion de la actual tension desde cuando EE.UU. violo flagrantemente el derecho de la RPDC a lanzar el satelite con fines pacificos.
					
					En este mundo no hay ningun Estado soberano que no toma contramedida frente a la violacion del legitimo derecho al desarrollo espacial, la soberania del pais.
					
					La RPDC se vio obligada a exponer solo la posicion de defensa legitima de tomar las contramedidas militares autodefensivas porque EE.UU. fabrico una tras otra las bandidescas "resoluciones de sancion" del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU y libro los ejercicios de guerra nuclear de caracter agresivo.
					
					Uno puede saber quien es el responsable de la exacerbacion de la tension si calcula quien gana provecho alli.
					
					EE.UU. saco provechos en introducir en gran medida toda clase de los pertrechos militares de punta persiguiendo la confrontacion militar con la RPDC e intensificar mas que nunca la ubicacion militar segun su estrategia de dar importancia a Asia y el Pacifico.
					
					Toma la RPDC como primer blanco en la region de Asia-Pacifico, y para este fin emplazo todos sus medios de ataque nuclear e hizo la amenaza fisica de ataque nuclear nunca vista en la historia.
					
					Traslado abiertamente a las aguas de la Peninsula Coreana los submarinos nucleares, uno de los 3 medios estrategicos de ataque nuclear y despacho los bombarderos estrategicos al espacio de esta region para ejercitar el bombardeo nuclear. Dice que aplazara temporalmente el lanzamiento de misil balistico intercontinental, tercer medio estrategico de ataque nuclear, pero planea realizarlo en mayo.
					
					Ahora, EE.UU. sigue desarrollando los ejercicios de guerra nuclear contra la RPDC y traslada los portaaviones nucleares a las aguas de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Bajo tal circunstancia, hablar del dialogo para eliminar las fuerzas disuasivas nucleares de la RPDC es un climax de engano para desviar la opinion publica mundial.
					
					Es una gran equivocacion si piensa en que la RPDC preste oido al dialogo de bandido que impone hacer algo esgrimiendo la pistola.
					
					El que obliga a la RPDC a hacer el dialogo solo cuando esta muestre primero la voluntad de desnuclearizacion deviene un acto hostil grosero para despreciar atrevidamente la linea del PTC y la ley de la RPDC.
					
					La RPDC no se opone al dialogo, pero nunca puede sentarse ante la mesa de negociaciones humillantes.
					
					La RPDC tiene la invariable posicion de que el dialogo debe basarse en los principios de respeto a la soberania y la igualdad.
					
					Mientras EE.UU. no renuncia la politica hostil y el chantaje nuclear anti-RPDC, el verdadero dialogo podra ser realizado cuando nos dispongamos suficientemente de las fuerzas disuasivas nucleares capaces de prevenir la amenaza de guerra nuclear de EE.UU.
					
					Esta vez, al recibir mas directamente la amenaza real de ataque nuclear de EE.UU., nos sentimos con carne propia la urgencia de ampliar y fortalecer cualitativa y cuantitativamente nuestras fuerzas disuasivas nucleares.
					
					Es muy logico tomar la contramedida autodefensiva con la intensificacion de las fuerzas armadas nucleares frente al chantaje y la amenaza nucleares de EE.UU., mayor poseedor de armas nucleares en el mundo.
					
					Los ejercicios de ataque nuclear de EE.UU. que se realizan apuntando a la RPDC nos obligan a hacer los ejercicios correspondientes.
					
					No hay ninguna garantia de que tales simulacros no pasarian a la guerra real, por lo tanto todas sus consecuencias recaeran sobre EE.UU.
					
					Mientras EE.UU. no pone fin a sus ejercicios militares ni retira todos sus armamentos agresivos, la RPDC seguira fortaleciendo el grado de enfrentamiento militar de autodefensa.

articles.title: BGDCDZE revela crimenes de autoridades surcoreanas
articles.content:
BGDCDZE revela crimenes de autoridades surcoreanas
Pyongyang, 17 de abril (ACNC) -- El Buro General de Direccion Central sobre el Desarrollo de Zona Especial publico el dia 16 un memorandum revelando el proceso de la construccion de la Zona Industrial de Kaesong (ZIK) y quien es el autor que puso esta zona en la crisis.
					Segun el documento, la ZIK se ha construido como simbolo de reconciliacion, cooperacion y reunificacion gracias a que el Dirigente Kim Jong Il tomo una decision audaz a partir del punto de vista del noble amor a la nacion y a los compatriotas apreciando el proposito patriotico pro-reunificacion de un empresario surcoreano.
					
					El Dirigente se reunio en octubre de 1999 y junio de 2000 con Jong Ju Yong, presidente honorario del Grupo Hyundai del Sur de Corea, ocasion en la cual acepto su peticion de construir en la parte de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea una zona especial economica administrada por la cooperacion del Norte y el Sur de Corea.
					
					Asi en la ZIK 123 empresas surcoreanas se han asentado para la prosperidad comun.
					
					El Mariscal Kim Jong Un presto atencion a la ZIK aun en medio de la aguda situacion creada debido a las recrudescentes maniobras conflictivas y belicas de las fuerzas anti-reunificacion internas y externas del pais y dirigio sabiamente a mantenerla y activarla.
					
					Pero, insatisfecha de la construccion de la ZIK desde el principio, la banda de los conservadores titeres del Sur de Corea se ha maniobrado desesperadamente para llevar al fracaso el trabajo de dicha zona, revela la nota y continua:
					
					Al empezar la construccion de la ZIK los compinches del "Gran Partido Nacional", predecesor del "Partido Saenuri" la impidieron a cada paso diciendo que "la zona especial economica ayudara el desarrollo de las armas nucleares y misiles del Norte" y que "puede ser entrega unilateral al Norte".
					
					Tan pronto como tomo el poder, el traidor Lee Myung Bak pisoteo la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre y freno la ejecucion de los articulos alusivos a la construccion de la ZIK aclarados en dicho documento.
					
					En marzo de 2008 el ministro de Unificacion del Sur de Corea, Kim Ha Jung revelo abiertamente su intencion malsana de destruir la labor de la ZIK en la charla con los delegados de las empresas de dicha zona y otras ocasiones.
					
					Las maniobras de la banda de Lee encaminadas a impedir el trabajo de la ZIK se tornaron mas graves con motivo del incidente de hundimiento de la corbeta surcoreana "Cheonan" en marzo de 2010, debido a lo cual el trabajo de la ZIK con el plan de desarrollar el area de mas de 60 millones de metros cuadrados en total dividiendo en 3 etapas se interrumpio sin desarrollar todavia la mitad del aerea de la primera etapa.
					
					Insatisfecha de esto, la banda de Lee abuso de la ZIK como el lugar de la intriga y confrontacion anti-RPDC.
					
					La ZIK se encuentra en la crisis irremediable por el "poder" conservador actual surcoreano que mantiene la brutal politica conflictiva del "poder" anterior de Lee Myung Bak. 
					
					Tan pronto como tomo el trono, el "poder" actual recurrio a la "sancion" anti-RPDC pretextando el lanzamiento de satelite con fines pacificos y la prueba nuclear de autodefensa e interrumpio completamente hasta la cooperacion entre las entidades civiles de ambas partes coreanas que marchaba a duras penas. 
					
					Y desde febril pasado tomo el control riguroso sobre la entrada de las mercancias en la ZIK. 
					
					Insulto extremadamente la dignidad de la RPDC con las palabras como "fuente de ingreso" y se desespero por convertir la ZIK en un campo de enfrentamiento anti-RPDC. 
					
					En particular, al permanecer en el cargo del ministro de Defensa Nacional, Kim Kwan Jin se entrego con mas frenesi, junto con EE.UU., a los ejercicios de guerra de agresion anti-RPDC con el fin de convertir la ZIK en el lugar de estallido de la guerra.
					
					Al mismo tiempo, los gangsteres de la capa militar surcoreana trazaron el plan de ataque a precision contra los monumentos al elogio y a la eternidad del lider, levantados en Pyongyang y otras ciudades de la RPDC y considerados como simbolo de su maxima dignidad.
					
					Ademas, Kim Pyong Gwan, que fue nominado como ministro de Defensa Nacional en el tiempo de formacion del nuevo "poder", el representante de esta cartera y otros gangsteres soltaron sin escrupulos las palabras provocativas tales como "derrocamiento del poder norcoreano", "sustitucion" y "derrumbe" insultando atrevidamente la maxima dignidad de la RPDC. 
					
					Hasta la inquilina de Chongwadae hablo de algun "cambio" criticando publicamente el sistema, la economia y la vida del pueblo de la RPDC y la calumnio gravemente diciendo que "no podra obtener nada con el desarrollo nuclear y la provocacion". 
					
					Indudablemente, la ZIK no puede existir nunca mas en esta voragine de confrontacion fratricida nunca vista. 
					
					Ahora la banda conservadora surcoreana insiste tanto en la "normalizacion de la ZIK" y "dialogo" no para traer algun viraje ni proteger las empresas pequenas y medianas surcoreanas, sino es una artimana astuta para eludir la responsabilidad de la crisis de la ZIK y justificar su campana de confrontacion fratricida y de guerra. 
					
					Los titeres surcoreanos no pueden eludir jamas la responsabilidad criminal por la situacion grave de hoy. 
					
					Si las autoridades surcoreanas siguen imputando a la RPDC la responsabilidad censurando nuestras importantes medidas, la situacion se empeorara mas y se encontrara en el dilema sin salida.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente de Zimbabwe
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente de Zimbabwe
Pyongyang, 17 de abril (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 12 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de la Republica de Zimbabwe, Robert G. Mugabe, con motivo del 33o aniversario de la fundacion de este pais africano.
					En la misiva el remitente expresa la conviccion de que las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises seguiran fortaleciendose y desarrollandose y desea al mandatario y al pueblo de Zimbabwe los exitos en sus esfuerzos por defender la soberania del pais y lograr la unidad nacional y el progreso socio-economico.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita al electo presidente venezolano
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita al electo presidente venezolano
Pyongyang, 17 de abril (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 15 un mensaje de felicitacion a Nicolas Maduro Moros, elegido como presidente de la Republica Bolivariana de Venezuela.
					El remitente en su misiva subraya que la eleccion de Nicolas Maduro Moros como presidente venezolano sirve de una confianza y esperaza del pueblo de vuestro pais y una muestra de la firme voluntad del pueblo venezolano de avanzar hasta el fin por el camino al socialismo.
					
					Convenciendo de que las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises se ampliaran y se desarrollaran aun mas en todas las esferas, le deseo de todo corazon grandes exitos en su labor responsable para defender la soberania del pais y el bienestar del pueblo.

articles.title: Choe Ryong Hae averigua estado de construccion de objetos importantes
articles.content:
Choe Ryong Hae averigua estado de construccion de objetos importantes
Pyongyang, 17 de abril (ACNC) -- El jefe de la Direccion Politica General del Ejercito Popular de Corea, Choe Ryong Hae, hizo conocimiento del estado de construccion del Museo Conmemorativo de la Victoria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria y la Tumba de los Martires del Ejercito Popular.
					En acato a la resolucion del pleno de marzo de 2013 del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, los oficiales y soldados del EPC, los funcionarios de la rama de construccion de la capital y miembros de brigada crean cada dia milagro e innovacion en los campos de construccion poniendo en manifiesto el impetu de frustrar las recrudescentes maniobras del imperialismo norteamericano y sus fuerzas seguidoras contra la RPDC.
					
					Choe recorrio varios lugares de construccion donde reina el espiritu de ataque de un tiron del ejercito revolucionario.
					
					Enfatizo que deben terminar en un corto plazo las obras garantizando la calidad con el unanime deseo de materializar cabalmente la orden del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Comandante Supremo del EPC, y crear el area verde en alrededores de lugares de construccion.
					
					Subrayo que los constructores militares deben realizar los meritos en el cumplimiento del deber asumido en consonancia con la abnegacion patriotica del Comandante Supremo y hacerse triunfadores en la lucha decisiva contra los yanquis.

articles.title: Ofensores a maxima dignidad de RPDC merecen sentencia de cielo, comenta ACNC
articles.content:
Ofensores a maxima dignidad de RPDC merecen sentencia de cielo, comenta ACNC
Pyongyang, 17 de abril (ACNC) -- El Dia del Sol, maxima fiesta nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, fue cometido en el Sur de Corea un crimen que consterna a toda la nacion coreana y la humanidad progresista.
					Los titeres surcoreanos lanzaron a los gangsteres al lugar centrico de Seul para organizar un mitin anti-RPDC y quemar los retratos, simbolos de la maxima dignidad de la RPDC.
					
					Ahora, en la Peninsula Coreana se ha creado una situacion muy tirante debido a las maniobras de Estados Unidos y el Sur de Corea contra la RPDC.
					
					Aunque sigue la situacion aguda, se celebra el Dia del Sol como evento maximo de la nacion y fiesta mundial segun el deseo unanime de toda la nacion coreana y la humanidad progresista.
					
					En adhesion a su amo norteamericano, los titeres surcoreanos desafian con alborotos de guerra nuclear a las justas contramedidas sobreduras del ejercito y pueblo coreanos para la defensa de la soberania y la dignidad del pais, e insultan hasta los actos por el Dia del Sol y la maxima dignidad.
					
					A traves de los medios de prensa venales, los titeres surcoreanos ya calumniaron a la RPDC diciendo que esta crea el estado de tiempo de guerra, por una parte y por la otra, infunde el clima festivo por el Dia del Sol para "demostrar la justeza del regimen" y "consolidar el interior", etc.
					
					Para colmo, se atrevieron a acusar nuestra Direccion Suprema de "estar afligida por la propuesta del dialogo de la parte surena".
					
					Precisamente, el 15 de abril, la gobernante del Sur de Corea en una misa hablo descaradamente que "si el Norte de Corea toma la correcta opcion, el Sur de Corea ira juntos por el camino de desarrollo comun" y otros chismes.
					
					Pese a las reiteradas advertencias de la RPDC, las actuales fuerzas gobernantes surcoreanas se aferran obstinadamente junto con EE.UU. a la provocacion politica y los ejercicios de guerra contra la RPDC, lo que demuestra fehacientemente que ellas son iguales a la banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak.
					
					Debido a tales actos groseros de los titeres surcoreanos la guerra esta a punto de estallar.
					
					Como ya fue declarada en ultimatum de la Comandancia Suprema del Ejercito Popular de Corea, la manifestacion militar de las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias de la RPDC sera el fuerte golpe a todas las fuerzas hostiles que difaman nuestra maxima dignidad.
					
					Ya que se metieron en la boca del lobo, los delincuentes sufriran a cada rato hasta cuando se inicien las acciones de represalia sin aviso de la RPDC.
					
					Los participantes en el crimen deben quejarse de si mismos aunque reciban la terrible sentencia del cielo.

articles.title: Hay que ver correctamente origen de aguda situacion de Peninsula Coreana, senala ACNC
articles.content:
Hay que ver correctamente origen de aguda situacion de Peninsula Coreana, senala ACNC
Pyongyang, 17 de abril (ACNC) -- Se libran en la etapa mas astuta las maquinaciones de aplastamiento de Estados Unidos contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					A traves de los ejercicios militares conjuntos "Foal Eagle" el imperio yanqui emplazo rapidamente sus inmensas fuerzas agresivas en la Peninsula Coreana y su contorno y concluyo los preparativos de ataque. Esta vez desvia la opinion publica como si su pais se interesara  en el aflojamiento de la situacion.
					
					Al dejar transmitir por via de medios de prensa el rumor de "posposicion de las acciones militares planeadas" y la "prorrogacion de la reunion relacionada con los asuntos militares", los interesados de alto rango dicen a porfia que "esta abierta la puerta de dialogo para el Norte (de Corea)".
					
					Esto es un engano para ocultar su naturaleza criminal como autor de la tirante situacion de la Peninsula Coreana y es fruto de vil complot para buscar el pretexto del estallido de la guerra imputando la responsabilidad de la tension a la RPDC.
					
					El problema es que las fuerzas satelites de EE.UU. se suman a estas acciones enganosas.
					
					Como mostro la historia, la verdad no puede ser aprobada con las manos alzadas.
					
					Para resolver de veras el problema de la Peninsula Coreana hay que distinguir correctamente su origen.
					
					La peor situacion creada hoy en esta Peninsula se ha creado por la politica y las acciones hostiles de EE.UU. contra la RPDC.
					
					Ademas, partio de la vil artimana de EE.UU. de aplastar de antemano la RPDC en la etapa de cambio historico.
					
					Para este fin, EE.UU. infunde el ambiente conflictivo acusando el lanzamiento del satelite artificial con fines pacificos de la RPDC de "tiro de misil balistico".
					
					A pesar de que se ha confirmado de modo cientifico el exitoso lanzamiento del satelite de la RPDC a traves de la comandancia universal de EE.UU. y el circulo cientifico, armo alboroto calificandolo como "provocacion".
					
					Cuando la RPDC realizo la prueba nuclear subterranea frente a los actos bandidescos de EE.UU. este invento la "resolucion de sancion" movilizando la maquinaria de votacion de la ONU y llevo a la vispera de la guerra la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana librando los ejercicios belicos "Key Resolve" y "Foal Eagle".
					
					EE.UU. consternado por las medidas superintransigentes de la RPDC tales como la declaracion del enfrentamiento total y la invalidacion del Acuerdo de Armisticio para acabar con la historia de confrontacion con EE.UU., comenzo a recurrir al nuevo complot.
					
					Esto es la "manifestacion de las fuerzas armadas sobre el Norte" bajo el pretexto del ofrecimiento de "paraguas nuclear" y la "diplomacia de presion" en la escena internacional so pretexto de la ejecucion de la "resolucion" de la ONU.
					
					Segun ello, EE.UU. incita a los reaccionarios japoneses y los titeres surcoreanos para que perpetren las provocaciones de toda indole y las maquinaciones intrigantes contra la RPDC.
					
					Por otra parte, en contraste con las freneticas maquinaciones provocativas de sus lacayos, intenta resaltar en la sociedad internacional el "caracter belico" de la RPDC orquestando del "ambiente del dialogo" y las "relaciones estrechas y el enfrentamiento comun" con los paises perifericos.
					
					Aunque EE.UU. arma toda clase de artimanas no podra liberarse de la responsabilidad del autor de la situacion actual de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Esto prueba que es invariable la politica de aplastamiento anti-RPDC de EE.UU. y el estallido de nueva guerra llego a la etapa final.
					
					En estos dias, EE.UU. practica la astucia para calmar la alerta de la RPDC diciendo el "ambiente pacifico de Pyongyang" y actua freneticamente para espiar el intento de la RPDC hablando de la "campana de propaganda" y "la guerra psicologica" de alguien.
					
					Mientras continua la politica hostil de EE.UU. no reinaran la paz y la seguridad en la Peninsula Coreana y seran mas superintransigentes las medidas de la RPDC.
					
					El unico remedio para resolver la tensa situacion de la Peninsula  Coreana es que el imperio abandone su politica hostil anti-RPDC.
					
					EE.UU. debe saber claramente que no puede liberarse de la responsabilidad de la grave situacion creada en esta Peninsula.

articles.title: EE.UU. debe cumplir sus deberes, asevera Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
EE.UU. debe cumplir sus deberes, asevera Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 17 de abril (ACNC) -- Estados Unidos y las fuerzas seguidoras acusan de "violacion de deberes internacionales" y "medidas provocativas" las medidas de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea de desarrollar la industria energetica nuclear e intensificar el disuasivo nuclear.
					En un comentario individual insertado este miercoles, el diario Rodong Sinmun asevera que de esta manera ellos intentan criminalizar otra vez la nueva linea del desarrollo paralelo de la RPDC y sus actividades para materializarla, y continua:
					
					El imperio yanqui dice que las medidas de la RPDC contravienen a la declaracion conjunta del 19 de septiembre acordada en las conversaciones a 6 bandas, pero aquel mismo debe cumplir antes que nadie lo que le debe.
					
					La citada declaracion aprobada en 2005, siendo un documento acordado entre los paises que tienen en aquel tiempo el interes sobre el problema de desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana, se basa en el principio de "palabra por palabra" y "accion por accion". 
					
					Sin embargo, el imperio yanqui no cumplio nada con sus acciones para ejecutar esa declaracion y cometio solamente las acciones contradictorias a esta. 
					
					En vez de observar la meta y principios de la Carta de la ONU, las autoridades norteamericanas tomaron la delantera en violar flagrantemente la soberania de la RPDC. 
					
					Ellas mismas no ejecutan ni una promesa, mientras califican el lanzamiento de los satelites de la RPDC de "lanzamiento de misil de largo alcance" y desarrollan anualmente el simulacro conjunto nuclear de gran envergadura apuntando a la RPDC.  A pesar de esto, dicen que la RPDC no cumple los deberes internacionales y congelo las conversaciones a seis bandas.
					
					La RPDC firmo varias veces los documentos con EE.UU., pero nada se llevo a la practica y solamente sufrio incontables perdidas.
					
					Las presentes medidas tomadas por la RPDC son justa opcion escogida segun la conclusion de que esta ya no tiene necesidad de discutir con EE.UU. y debe defender la soberania del pais y acelerar la construccion de la potencia economica solo por su propia cuenta.
					
					EE.UU. debe tener presente que cometera el error mas grande si viola los deberes internacionales y actua a su antojo en las relaciones con otros paises y debe cumplir primero sus deberes internacionales.
